mapper.select: SELECT /*login.loginBackImg*/ '/resources/img/login/' || COMD_NAME as BACK_IMGG FROM TB_CODEXD WHERE COMM_CODE = 'LOGI_BIMG' ORDER BY CODE_OPT1

SELECT /*login.login*/ USER_NUMB , getCodeName('USER_TYPE',SUBSTR(USER_NUMB,1,2)) AS USER_TYPE , USER_NAME , USER_NICK , CASE WHEN LENGTH(FILE_SVNM) > 32 THEN '/resources/img/upload/profile/'|| USER_NUMB ||'/'|| FILE_SVNM ELSE '/resources/img/basic/profile/' || FILE_SVNM END AS USER_IMAG , SUBSTR(REGI_NUMB, 1, 6) AS USER_BIRTH , SUBSTR(REGI_NUMB, 7) AS USER_JUMIN2 , CASE WHEN MOD(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(REGI_NUMB, 7, 1)), 2) = 1 THEN 'M' ELSE 'W' END AS USER_GNDR , CASE WHEN BANN_DATE IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS BANN_YSNO FROM TM_USERXM WHERE USER_IDXX = 'user1@example.com' AND PASS_WORD = 'password1'
